label: AB6CD6E6_hP40_194_c_gh_b_k_k-001
title: Barlowite [Cu$_{4}$FBr(OH)$_{6}$] Structure
comments:
The Cu-II (6h) sites are occupied 1/3 of the time.  For approximate first-principles calculations they could be replaced by a fully-filled (2d) site [$\pm$ (1/3 2/3 3/4)]. 
 We use the (Smaha, 2018) data for ``Barlowite 1,'' the file 1.cif in the supplementary data. The ICSD entry appears to be for ``Barlowite 2.'' (2.cif)  There are only minor differences between the two structures. 
 The experiment used pure deuterium to make the crystallographic measurements.
